at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon

Class Daemon.ClientRequestImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.Daemon.ClientRequestImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientRequestExecutionStrategy
    Enclosing class:
    Daemon

    private class Daemon.ClientRequestImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientRequestExecutionStrategy
    This is the implementation of the client request handling.

                                java.lang.String bufferName)

      • setBufferConfiguration

        public boolean setBufferConfiguration(DaemonEndpoint conn,
                                      java.lang.String bufferName,
                                      BufferConfiguration config,
                                      boolean create)
        Changes the configuration of a buffer. If the buffer doesn't exists and the create-argument is set to true, a new buffer is created.
        Specified by:
        setBufferConfiguration in interface ClientRequestExecutionStrategy
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection
        bufferName - the name of the buffer
        config - the buffer configuration
        create - is the creation of a new buffer allowed
        Returns:
        true, if the buffer configuration is changed

        Specified by:
        setBufferValue in interface ClientRequestExecutionStrategy
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection
        bufferName - the name of the buffer
        value - the new buffer value
        Returns:

      • queryBuffersByMetainfo

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> queryBuffersByMetainfo(DaemonEndpoint conn,
                                                              java.lang.String topic,
                                                              java.lang.String feature)
        This method looks for available buffers.
        Specified by:
        queryBuffersByMetainfo in interface ClientRequestExecutionStrategy
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection
        topic - a regular expression specifying the buffer topics, which should be scanned for the wanted features. These are keys of the buffer meta information. A simple match satisfy the search condition, the regular expression must not match the whole topic name.
        feature - a regular expression specifying the buffer features, which should be scanned. A simple match satisfy the search condition, the regular expression must not match the whole feature description.
        Returns:
        a collection of all the buffers matching this query

      • queryBuffersByName

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> queryBuffersByName(DaemonEndpoint conn,
                                                          java.lang.String name)
        This method looks for available buffers.
        Specified by:
        queryBuffersByName in interface ClientRequestExecutionStrategy
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection
        name - a regular expression specifying the buffer name, which should be scanned. A simple match satisfy the search condition, the regular expression must not match the whole name.
        Returns:
        a collection of all the buffers matching this query

        Releases a buffer.
        Specified by:
        removeBuffer in interface ClientRequestExecutionStrategy
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection
        bufferName - the name of the buffer
        Returns:
        true, if the buffer is now released
